channel.title: [FIXED] Kleiner looking at a headcrab
channel.description: When Kleiner comes to look at the spawned headcrab in the pod, he actually looks to the front, not at the crab. His head should at least go a bit downwards.

item.title: [FIXED] Kleiner looking at a headcrab
item.dc:creator: Xeoxer
item.description:
When Kleiner comes to look at the spawned headcrab in the pod, he actually looks to the front, not at the crab. His head should at least go a bit downwards.
